ComicInfo.Title: Ch-Ch-Changes: Part 4 of the 6 Part Genesis
ComicInfo.Summary:
GENESIS: Part 4 of 6: Ch-Ch-Changes - He came, he saw, he kicked some super-hero butt! Extreme has defeated the Ex-Mutants and has now invaded the Protectors' world! L.A. has been destroyed and replaced by Sluggtown, and the Protectors blame the Ex-Mutants for the mass destruction! The few Ex-Mutants who survived Extreme's attack are radically altered, and they must take on the Protectors alone!
Genesis Part 5 continues in Dinosaurs for Hire #9.
Genesis Part 6 continues in Protectors #14.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 18:39:26. [CVDB37924] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 03:29:02. [Issue ID 53777]

ComicInfo.Colorist: Rick Schmitz,Psychedelic Prisms,Tom O'Connor,Rick Schmitz,Psychedelic Prisms
